channel.title: Protecting your Internet traffic in volatile times

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
Looking at the Torstatus it seems ~90% of the Relays are very slow ones. Pretty useless for guard and maybe even as middleman.

Would be much better if they run as bridges especially when they are on dynamic IP Adresses.

How about making more Advertisment to run Bridges incase the supporter has a dynamic DSL line?
